about_the_game:
Resolve is a large scale first person combined-arms shooter, where teamwork is your strongest weapon and every decision matters. Out-smart, out-play and out-gun your enemy with real-time tactics, coordination and skill.

At the heart of the game is a focus on communication and collaboration where you will group up, secure armaments and supply lines, and defend yourself against other teams.

Features include:

  • Push your luck as a small raiding squad, or name and create your own team to dominate the map
  • Large scale maps where you decide your approach.
  • Deep teamplay mechanics that push your skills of collaboration.
  • Experience high tension tactical engagements, where planning and coordination makes the difference between victory or defeat
  • Explore a world devastated by war that sets the stage for fierce and unpredictable battles.
  • A diverse selection of maps based on iconic battles and completely new environments.
  • Fight for control over resources that change to make every game unique.
  • Deep teamplay mechanics designed from the ground up to be easy to learn.
  • More than 30 highly detailed firearms.
  • An expanding roster of vehicles, field guns and artillery.
  • Responsive cover system, to mount and peek over obstacles

Violence has left the planet scarred and broken. The old empires have crumbled leaving their armies fragmented with no allegience.

Now, years later, a new fight emerges. Not for continents but for survival. New regional powers are rising and small armed groups form to clash over scarce resources, unsure who is friend or foe.

You are a soldier wearing a uniform that has lost its meaning and now you must find new purpose. Kill again or share the spoils - it’s up to you.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features depictions of war not appropriate for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 6600 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 12GB / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: RESOLVE is a large-scale combined arms tactical shooter, where you dynamically form and build a team to fight for control over scarce resources. Experience tense calculated engagements with your raiding party or fierce frontline battles with your team in a world that has been devastated by war.
